summary: Craig Malcolm Robinson  is an American college basketball coach and the current head men's basketball coach at Oregon State University.
full_text:
Craig Malcolm Robinson  is an American college basketball coach and broadcaster. He is a former head men's basketball coach at Oregon State University and Brown University. He was a star forward as a player at Princeton University in the early 1980s and a bond trader during the 1990s. He currently works as an analyst for ESPN.
He is the older brother of U.S. First Lady Michelle Obama, and the brother-in-law of U.S. President Barack Obama. Robinson has been married twice and has four children.
title: Craig Robinson (basketball)
